name: Dojigiri Yasutsuna [Bride]
ability: Moderately increases damage dealt when one of the Five Swords Under Heaven is on the team.
Increases own level by 10 when Shuten Doji is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven, known for killing demons. Her feelings for Shuten Doji have helped her grow into a new woman. She also seems to have taken to caring about her appearance, constantly admiring herself whenever she passes by a mirror. Their ceremony was never actually held, but, despite the outcome she was still very happy they reaffirmed their feelings for one another. And, after everything was said and done, she apparently made off with the wedding dress and all the accessories, too.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Defeat LVL 80, 100, 150, 175, 200 Noddy.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Random drops after LVL 80.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "Romance of the Demon and Sword" event.

main: "I d-don't like getting all dressed up!"
summon: "Oh stop it. You're making a girl blush."
limit_break: "I'm so happy I feel on top of the world!"
